title: I refuse to accept a loss over riots blunders
body: Got into a normal game of ranked, all over the map there are invisible walls that wont let any abilities go through only for my team

replies.body:
Uhhh that doesn't sound like a Riot issue or ranked at the very least would be disabled, that sounds like a texture (client-side) or connection issue or some combination thereof.

1. Update your graphics card drivers if they aren't already.
2. Try connecting via Ethernet if you aren't already and it's possible.
3. Repair your client
4. Clean reinstall your game with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool)
5. Use the HRT to troubleshoot connection issues
